verses.verse: In <S%G1722><s%> Year <S%G2094><s%> Now The <S%G1161><s%> Fifteenth <S%G4003><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Government <S%G2231><s%> Of Tiberius <S%G5086><s%> Caesar, <S%G2541><s%> Being Governor <S%G2230><s%> Pontius <S%G4194><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Judea, <S%G2449><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Being Tetrarch <S%G5075><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Galilee <S%G1056><s%> Herod, <S%G2264><s%> <S%G5376><s%> And Philip <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother <S%G846><s%>, Being Tetrarch <S%G5075><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Ituraea <S%G2484><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Trachonitis The <S%G5139><s%> Region, <S%G5561><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lysanias <S%G3078><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Abilene <S%G9><s%> Being Tetrarch, <S%G5075><s%>

' In The <S%G1909><s%> High Priesthood <S%G749><s%> Of Annas <S%G452><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Caiaphas, <S%G2533><s%> Came The <S%G1096><s%> Word <S%G4487><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Zacharias <S%G2197><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wilderness. <S%G2048><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Went <S%G2064><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Country Around <S%G4066><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> Proclaiming The <S%G2784><s%> Baptism <S%G908><s%> Of Repentance <S%G3341><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Remission <S%G859><s%> Of Sins; <S%G266><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> It Has Been Written <S%G1125><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Book <S%G976><s%> Of The Words <S%G3056><s%> Of Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet, <S%G4396><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> The Voice <S%G5456><s%> Of One Crying <S%G994><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> Prepare <S%G2090><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> Of The Lord; <S%G2962><s%> Straight <S%G2117><s%> Make <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paths <S%G5147><s%> His. <S%G846><s%>

Every <S%G3956><s%> Ravine <S%G5327><s%> Shall Be Filled Up, <S%G4137><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Mountain <S%G3735><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hill <S%G1015><s%> Shall Be Made Low; <S%G5013><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Become <S%G2071><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crooked Places <S%G4646><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> A Straight Path, <S%G2117><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rough <S%G5138><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Ways <S%G3598><s%> Smooth; <S%G3006><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Shall See <S%G3700><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Salvation <S%G4992><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

He Said <S%G3004><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Coming Out <S%G1607><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> To Be Baptized <S%G907><s%> ' By <S%G5259><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Offspring <S%G1081><s%> Of Vipers, <S%G2191><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Forewarned <S%G5263><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> To Flee <S%G5343><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coming <S%G3195><s%> Wrath? <S%G3709><s%>

Produce <S%G4160><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Fruits <S%G2590><s%> Worthy <S%G514><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Repentance; <S%G3341><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Begin <S%G756><s%> To Say <S%G3004><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> For Father <S%G3962><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> <S%G3004><s%> For I Say <S%G1063><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3037><s%> These Stones <S%G5130><s%> To Raise Up <S%G1453><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Abraham. <S%G11><s%>

<S%G2235><s%> But Already <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Axe <S%G513><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Root <S%G4491><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Trees <S%G1186><s%> Is Applied : <S%G2749><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Tree <S%G1186><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Producing <S%G4160><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Is Cut Down <S%G1581><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Into The <S%G1519><s%> Fire <S%G4442><s%> Is Cast. <S%G906><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Asked <S%G1905><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds, <S%G3793><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Shall We Do? <S%G4160><s%>

<S%G611><s%> And Answering <S%G1161><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Tunics <S%G5509><s%> Let Him Impart <S%G3330><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Him That <S%G3361><s%> Has Not; <S%G2192><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> Victuals <S%G1033><s%> Likewise <S%G3668><s%> Let Him Do. <S%G4160><s%>

<S%G2064><s%> And Came <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Tax Gatherers <S%G5057><s%> To Be Baptized, <S%G907><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Shall We Do? <S%G4160><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Nothing <S%G3367><s%> More <S%G4119><s%> Beyond <S%G3844><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Is Appointed <S%G1299><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Exact. <S%G4238><s%>

<S%G1905><s%> And Asked <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Those Who Were Soldiers, <S%G4754><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Shall We Do? <S%G4160><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> No One <S%G3367><s%> Oppress <S%G1286><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> Accuse Falsely, <S%G4811><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Be Satisfied <S%G714><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3800><s%> With Your Wages. <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G4328><s%> But As Were In Expectation <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People, <S%G2992><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Reasoning <S%G1260><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Their Hearts <S%G846><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> Whether Or Not <S%G3379><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Might Be <S%G1498><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

Answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> All, <S%G537><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Indeed 3303 PRT With Water 5204 N-DSN Baptize 907 V-PAI-1S You, 5209 P-2AP 2064 V-PNI-3S But He Comes 1161 CONJ Who Is 3588 T-NSM Mightier 2478 A-NSM-C Than I, 3450 P-1GS Of Whom 3739 R-GSM 3756 PRT-N I Am Not 1510 V-PXI-1S Fit 2425 A-NSM To Loose 3089 V-AAN The 3588 T-ASM Thong 2438 N-ASM 3588 T-GPN 5266 N-GPN Of His Sandals; 846 P-GSM He 846 P-NSM You 5209 P-2AP Will Baptize 907 V-FAI-3S With The 1722 PREP Spirit 4151 N-DSN Holy 40 A-DSN And 2532 CONJ With Fire; 4442 N-DSN

Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Winnowing Fan Is <S%G4425><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> His Hand, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Will Thoroughly Purge <S%G1245><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G257><s%> His Floor, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Gather <S%G4863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wheat <S%G4621><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G596><s%> His Granary, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Chaff <S%G892><s%> He Will Burn <S%G2618><s%> With Fire <S%G4442><s%> Unquenchable. <S%G762><s%>

<S%G4183><s%> Many <S%G3303><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Other Things <S%G2087><s%> Exhorting <S%G3870><s%> He Announced The Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> People. <S%G2992><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Tetrarch <S%G5076><s%> Being Reproved <S%G1651><s%> ' By <S%G5259><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Herodias <S%G2266><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wife <S%G1135><s%> Of Philip <S%G5376><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Had Done The <S%G4160><s%> Evils <S%G4190><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Herod, <S%G2264><s%>

Added <S%G4369><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G2532><s%> He Shut Up <S%G2623><s%> <S%G3588><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prison. <S%G5438><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> <S%G1161><s%> Now It Came To Pass <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Having Been Baptized <S%G907><s%> All <S%G537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People, <S%G2992><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Having Been Baptized <S%G907><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Praying, <S%G4336><s%> Was Opened <S%G455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Descended <S%G2597><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> In A Bodily <S%G4984><s%> Form <S%G1491><s%> As <S%G5616><s%> A Dove <S%G4058><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Came, <S%G1096><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> My Son <S%G3450><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beloved, <S%G27><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> I Have Found Delight. <S%G2106><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> About <S%G5616><s%> Years Old <S%G2094><s%> Thirty <S%G5144><s%> Beginning To Be, <S%G756><s%> Being, <S%G5607><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Was Supposed, <S%G3543><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Heli, <S%G2242><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> Of Joanna, <S%G2490><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Rhesa, <S%G4488><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Zerubbabel, <S%G2216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Shealtiel, <S%G4528><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Neri, <S%G3518><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Of Methuselah, <S%G3103><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Enoch, <S%G1802><s%> <S%G3588><s%>, Of Jared, <S%G2391><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Mahalaleel, <S%G3121><s%> <S%G3588><s%>, Of Cainan, <S%G2536><s%>
